featured.text: The underlined word ulcer in the second paragraph refers to a particular kind of (A) mental illness.

definition.zh_def: 疾病；身體或心理的健康問題。
definition.en_def: A state of being unwell or having a disease, affecting physical or mental health.
definition.example: She took a day off work due to her illness.
